title: Will the Mobile WiFi connect to the Internet automatically if I roam to a different network?
answer:
Please check the connection mode of your Mobile WiFi firstly.

1.Manual mode: You can launch the web management page and follow the prompts to connect to or disconnect from the network. The network connection is irrespective of roaming state of the network.
2.Auto mode:
    Automatically connect even when roaming is selected by default. If you roam to a different network with the Mobile WiFi, it will automatically disconnect an established network connection. If you need to access the Internet from the new network, you must re-establish a network connection.
    If Automatically connect even when roaming is not selected, the established network connection will not be effected by roaming state of the network
